trans-unit.source: In this page, configure your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. The HTTP proxy settings are for the communication with a @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ parent server, if there is any. The HTTP proxy should be of the form: hostname:port, but the default port 8080 will be used if none is explicitly provided. HTTP proxy settings for client systems to connect to this @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ can be different, and will be configured separately.
trans-unit.target: 在此页面中配置 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@。HTTP 代理设置用来与 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 父服务器（如果有）通讯。HTTP 代理应采用以下格式：主机名:端口，如果未显式提供端口，将使用默认端口 8080。要连接到此 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 的客户端系统的 HTTP 代理设置可能不同，将单独进行配置。

trans-unit.source: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ allows for the creation of multiple 'organizations' on a @@PRODUCT_NAME@@.
trans-unit.target: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 允许在一个 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 中生成多个 ‘机构’。

trans-unit.source: Organizations are a way to place boundaries between sets of systems, system groups, software channels, autoinstallation profiles, activation keys, configuration channels and files, users - everything you manage using @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. Each organization is managed by at least one organization administrator, and the entire @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ is managed by a @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ administrator. The organizations on one @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ with multiple organizations function similarly to the organizations on multiple @@PRODUCT_NAME@@s with one organization.
trans-unit.target: 组织（Organization）是一种在系统集、系统组、软件频道、订阅和权利、Kickstart 侧写、 激活密钥、配置频道和文件、用户 - 您用 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 进行管理的一切之间 放置边界的方式。 每个组织都由至少一个组织管理员进行管理，且整个 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 由一个 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 管理员来管理。对应多个组织的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 和对应多个 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 的组织功能类似。

trans-unit.source: Warning: The Kickstart Profile selected is set to destroy all partitions on all disks, including logical disks on attached SANs. If you do not want to lose data on one or more disks you should remove the disk from the server before kickstarting or edit the "clearpart" option for this Kickstart Profile.
trans-unit.target: 警告：将所选 Kickstart 侧写设定为删除所有 磁盘中的所有分区，其中包括附加爱 SAN 中的逻辑磁盘。 如果您不想要丢失一个或者多个 磁盘中的数据，则应在 Kickstart 前 或者编辑这个 Kickstart 侧写的 "clearpart" 选项前将该磁盘从该服务器中移除。

trans-unit.source: Warning: The Kickstart Profile(s) used may destroy all partitions on all disks of the kickstarted machines, including logical disks on attached SANs. If you do not want to lose data on one or more disks you should remove the disks from the servers before kickstarting or ensure that the Kickstart Profile(s) used will not destroy the partitions by editing the "clearpart" option.
trans-unit.target: 警告：所用的 Kickstart 配置文件可能会销毁 无人值守安装的计算机中所有磁盘上的所有分区，包括挂接的 SAN 上的逻辑磁盘。 如果您不想要丢失一个或多个磁盘上的数据，应在无人值守安装之前移除服务器上的 磁盘，或者通过编辑 "clearpart" 选项来确保所用的 Kickstart 配置文件 不会销毁分区。

trans-unit.source: You may specify scripts to run during the kickstart process, either before (pre-kickstart) or after (post-kickstart) the operating system installation starts. These scripts are useful for tasks such as setting up NFS mounts, moving files before installation, turning services on, or adding users after installation.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to re-use an existing Autoinstallation Profile we recommend you to copy-paste the template from /var/lib/rhn/kickstarts instead of from your browser. This will ensure that the template variables will be preserved and the registration process will work properly after the autoinstallation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要重复使用现有的自动安装配置文件，我们建议您复制并粘贴 /var/lib/rhn/kickstarts 中的模板，而不是浏览器中的模板。这可以保证模板变量会得到保留，并且在自动安装后注册过程正常进行。

trans-unit.source: You can associate one or more activation keys with this kickstart profile. Activation keys will allow systems kickstarted with this profile to automatically register to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@, gain @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ system types, subscribe to specified software and configuration channels, and subscribe to specified system groups. Activation keys can also specify packages to be installed on a system. Please consider how this may affect your package selection in this profile's Software tab.
trans-unit.target: 您可将一个或多个激活码与这个 kickstart 侧写关联。激活码将允许使用这个侧写进行 kickstart 的系统自动注册到 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@；获得 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服务级别权利；订阅特定的软件和配置频道；订阅到特定的系统组群。激活码还可以指定在系统中安装的软件包。请考虑中对您如何选择这个侧写中的 软件 标签有何影响。

trans-unit.source: Note: The selection of incompatible activation keys can prevent a system from registering properly after it is kickstarted. You'll want to review the Reference Guide section on using multiple activation keys before making use of this feature.
trans-unit.target: 注意：选择不兼容的激活密钥可能会导致在以无人值守方式安装 (kickstart) 系统后，该系统无法正常注册。在使用此功能之前，请查看有关使用多个激活密钥的参考指南章节。

trans-unit.source: Warning: Any child channel subscriptions associated with this profile will be overridden if any activation keys are selected above. If you wish to associate activation keys with this profile, please use an activation key to specify child channel subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: 警告：如果选择了上面任何的激活码，任何和本侧写相关联的子频道订阅将被覆盖。如果您希望将激活码与此侧写关联，请使用激活码来指定子频道的订阅。

trans-unit.source: You can associate file preservation lists with this kickstart profile by selecting them below. When a system is kickstarted, any files or directories listed in the file preservation lists associated with this kickstart profile will be saved before the kickstart is performed and restored once it is complete. If you would like to create a new file preservation list, you can do so at the File Preservation tab.

trans-unit.source:
You can edit the pre and post scripts for this kickstart below. Kickstart pre-scripts are run immediately after a kickstart file has been parsed on a system. You can access the network in this section, but you must use IP addresses (name service has not been configured at this point). For more details on kickstart pre scripts, please refer to the @@ENTERPRISE_LINUX_NAME@@ System Administration Guide.

You can also edit the post script for this kickstart below. First, commands related to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ will automatically be performed (for example, system registration to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@). Next, the non-chroot post script will be executed, and finally the post script will be executed. For more details on kickstart post scripts, please refer to the @@ENTERPRISE_LINUX_NAME@@ System Administration Guide.
trans-unit.target:
可在下面编辑此 kickstart 的前脚本和后脚本。在系统上分析某个 kickstart 文件后，会立即运行 kickstart 前脚本。 可在此部分访问网络，但必须使用 IP 地址（目前尚未配置名称服务）。有关 kickstart 前脚本的更多细节，请参见《@@ENTERPRISE_LINUX_NAME@@ 系统管理指南》。

还可在下面编辑此 kickstart 的后脚本。首先，会自动执行与 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 相关的命令（例如，将系统注册到 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@）。 接下来会执行非 chroot 后脚本，最后执行后脚本。有关 kickstart 后脚本的更多细节，请参见 《@@ENTERPRISE_LINUX_NAME@@ 系统管理指南》。

trans-unit.source: Tip: Leave this field blank to use the install-time shell as language for your post script.
trans-unit.target: 窍门： 当此项为空时，将使用安装时的 shell 做为您的后脚本语言。

trans-unit.source: Enable this to enable templating on this script using cobbler.
trans-unit.target: 启用这个来使用 cobbler 在这个脚本中启用模板化。

trans-unit.source: Tip: This specifies when the script gets ran (before or after kickstart).
trans-unit.target: 窍门： 它指定了脚本运行的时间（在 kickstart 前或 kickstart 后）。

trans-unit.source: You can edit the post script for this kickstart below. First, commands related to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ will automatically be performed (for example, system registration to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@). Next, the non-chroot post script will be executed, and finally the post script will be executed. For more details on kickstart post scripts, please refer to the Red Hat Enterprise Linux System Administration Guide.
trans-unit.target: 您可以为下面的这个 kickstart 编辑后脚本。首先，将自动执行与 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 有关的命令（例如，在 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 中注册系统）。接下来，将执行 non-chroot 后脚本。最后，执行后脚本。如需了解更多与 kickstart 后脚本相关的信息，请参阅《红帽企业版 Linux 系统管理指南》。

trans-unit.source: The snippet name is the name of a file that will reside in this organization's snippet directory. Any standard unix file name characters are acceptable. Snippet names containing slash character or snippet names beginning with period are not allowed.

trans-unit.source: The kickstart template has syntax rules, using punctuation symbols. To avoid clashes, they need to be properly treated.
trans-unit.target: 该 kickstart 模板有语法规则，使用标点符号。要避免冲突，需正确使用这些规则。

trans-unit.source:
In case the kickstart scenario contains any shell script using variables like $(example) its content should be escaped by using the backslash symbol:

This is an \$(example) content.

If variable named "example" is defined in the kickstart snippet, the templating engine will evaluate "$example" with its content. If there is no such variable, the content will be left unchanged. Escaping the $ symbol will prevent the templating engine to perform its evaluation as an internal variable.

Long scripts or strings can be escaped by wrapping them with the #raw and #end raw directives. For example:
trans-unit.target:
如果 kickstart 方案包含任何使用变量（例如 $(example)）的外壳脚本，应使用反斜杠符号将其内容转义：

这是一段 \$(example) 内容。

如果在 kickstart 片段中定义了名为 "example" 的变量，模板引擎将评估 "$example" 及其内容。如果没有此类变量，内容将保持不变。转义 $ 符号可防止模板引擎将它评估为内部变量。

可以使用 #raw 和 #end raw 指令包装较长的脚本或字符串，从而将其转义。例如：

trans-unit.source: An additional attention needs to be paid to the similar scenarios:
trans-unit.target: 类似情况需要格外小心：

trans-unit.source: Any line which has a # symbol followed by a whitespace is treated as a comment and is not evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 使用 # 符号后接空格的行都被视为注释行，且不进行评估。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this snippet permanently?
trans-unit.target: 您确认要永久删除这个 Snippet 吗？

trans-unit.target: 在 up2date/yum 中启用 debug

trans-unit.source: LILO is a text-based bootloader. Choose LILO as your bootloader if you are having video card issues.
trans-unit.target: LILO 是一个基于文本的启动加载程序。如果您有与显示卡相关的问题，请使用 LILO 作为您的引导装载程序。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the following options to specify Locale options:
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改以下的选项来设置地区选项：
步骤1：创建 Kickstart 侧写

trans-unit.source: A kickstart file is a simple text file containing a list of items, each identified by a keyword, that answers the questions an installer needs in order to successfully install Red Hat Enterprise Linux. A kickstart profile includes a kickstart file, as well as other saved options such as the version of Red Hat Enterprise Linux to be installed and the location of the installation files.
trans-unit.target: kickstart 文件是一个包含项列表的简单文本文件，其中每个项由一个关键字标识，该项解答了有关安装程序需要哪些信息才能成功安装 Red Hat Enterprise Linux 的问题。一个 kickstart 配置文件包含一个 kickstart 文件以及其他保存的选项，例如要安装的 Red Hat Enterprise Linux 版本和安装文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Always use the newest Red Hat Tree for this base channel.
trans-unit.target: 总是在这个基础频道中使用最新红帽树。

trans-unit.source: Always use the newest Tree for this base channel. "Newest" is determined by the date it was last modified.
trans-unit.target: 总是在这个基本频道中使用最新的树。“最新的”状态由其上次修改的日期决定。

trans-unit.source: In order to install Red Hat Enterprise Linux during kickstart, the Red Hat Enterprise Linux installation files must be available to the kickstarting system via network connection. You can make these available either via http or ftp.
trans-unit.target: 要在 kickstart 时安装红帽企业 Linux，红帽企业 Linux 安装文件必须可以通过网络被 kickstart 的系统所访问。您可以使用 http 或 ftp。

trans-unit.source: The kickstart profile will need to have a root password for the system(s) to be kickstarted in order to complete the kickstart process.
trans-unit.target: Kickstart 侧写需要有被 kickstart 系统的 root 密码方可完成 kickstart 过程。

trans-unit.source: Activation Keys are used to register systems. Systems registered with an activation key will inherit the characteristics defined by that key.
trans-unit.target: 激活码是用来注册系统的。使用激活码注册的系统将保持其在激活码中定义的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following activation keys have been created for use by your organization.
trans-unit.target: 已创建以下激活密钥供您的组织使用。

trans-unit.source: If a universal default activation key is set for your organization, then systems registered to your organization will inherit the properties of that key by default without the need to explicitly specify that key during registration.
trans-unit.target: 如果为您的机构设置了统一默认激活码，那么注册到您机构的系统将默认沿用该密钥的属性而无需在注册时特别支持。

trans-unit.source: Click on the description above to view the details for this key.
trans-unit.target: 点击上述描述部分来查看这个密钥的详情。

trans-unit.source: Use this to describe what kind of settings this key will reflect on systems that use it. If left blank, this field will be filled in '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 用这个来描述在使用它的系统中该密钥会反应出什么样的设置。如果是空白，那么会在此字段填写'{0}'。

trans-unit.source: {0} key(s) were enabled and {1} key(s) were disabled.
trans-unit.target: 启用 {0} 密钥，并禁用 {1} 密钥。

trans-unit.source: You do not currently have a universal default activation key set. To set a key as the universal default, please visit the details page of that key and check off the 'Universal Default?' checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 目前您没有统一默认激活码设定。要将某个密钥设定为统一默认激活码，请访问那个密钥的详情页面并核对“统一默认”选择框。

trans-unit.source: This key is your organization's universal default activation key.
trans-unit.target: 这个密钥就是您机构的统一默认激活码。

trans-unit.source: Leave blank for automatic key generation. Note that the prefix is an indication of the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ organization the key is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 如果是空白就会自动生成密钥。请注意：前缀是与此密钥关联的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 机构的标志。

trans-unit.source: Activation key can contains only numbers [0-9], letters [a-z A-Z], '-', '_' and '.'
trans-unit.target: 激活密钥只能包含数字 [0-9]、字母 [a-z A-Z]、'-'、'_' 和 '.'

trans-unit.source: Choose "{0}" to allow systems to register to the default SUSE Manager provided channel that corresponds to the installed SUSE Linux version. Instead of the default, you may choose a particular SUSE provided channel or a custom base channel, but if a system using this key is not compatible with the selected channel, it will fall back to its SUSE Manager Default channel.
trans-unit.target: 选择"{0}"允许系统注册到与其所安装的红帽企业版 Linux 的版本相关的红帽默认提供的频道。您还可以在此选择红帽特别提供的频道或者定制基本频道，但请注意：如果使用此密钥的系统和选择的频道不匹配，它将会返回到红帽默认频道。

trans-unit.source: Only one universal default activation key may be set for this organization. By setting this key as universal default, you will remove universal default status from the current universal default key if it exists. If this key is set as universal default, then newly-registered systems to your organization will inherit the properties of this key.
trans-unit.target: 为这个机构只能设置一个统一默认激活码。要将此密钥设定为统一默认激活码，您将要从现有的同一默认密钥中删除统一默认状态。如果将这个密钥设置为统一默认激活码，那么之后注册到您的机构中的系统将会沿用这个密钥的属性。

trans-unit.source: If you modify the key itself above, please note that the key will be prepended with a '{0}'. This is to identify the organization with which the key is associated and is associated with the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@'s multiple organizations feature.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要修改上述密钥，请注意会在该密钥后附加 '{0}'。这是为了要识别该密钥关联的机构以及与 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 的多机构属性的关联。

trans-unit.source: Systems registered with this activation key will inherit the settings listed below.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个激活码注册的系统将保留下面列出的设置。

trans-unit.source: Please specify a new Description for the cloned Activation Key. All options and settings from the source ativation key will be copied to the cloned one without the Universal default option. In case no description is specified, the cloned activation key will be created with the same description as the source one preceded by "clone-".
trans-unit.target: 为克隆的激活码指定新描述。会将源激活码的所有选项和设置都复制到克隆的激活码中，统一默认选项除外。如果未指定描述，则会使用与源激活码描述相同的内容创建克隆的激活码，并附带前缀 "clone-"。

trans-unit.source: Are you certain you want to delete this key? Activation Keys cannot be recovered once they have been deleted. (Note: A key can be disabled on the key list page, which prevents it from being used, but preserves it for later use.)
trans-unit.target: 您确定要删除这个密钥吗？激活码一旦被删除就无法恢复了。（请注意：在 key list page 可禁用某个密钥，这样可防止现在使用它，但可在将来使用。）

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Only systems and profiles known to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ server will be updated. Kickstarting other entities (e.g., system profiles created using the cobbler command-line tools) which use this key will FAIL if the key is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 注意：只会更新 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服务器已知的系统和配置文件。如果删除此密钥，以无人值守方式安装使用此密钥的其他实体（例如，使用 cobbler 命令行工具创建的系统配置文件）将会失败。

trans-unit.source: Deploy configuration files to systems on registration
trans-unit.target: 注册时将配置文件部署到系统

trans-unit.source: Any system registered with this activation key will have the packages listed below installed, if those packages are available. Package names may be listed as package name only or may include an extension to specify the desired architecture. There should only one package name included per line.
trans-unit.target: 将为使用此激活密钥注册的任何系统安装下面列出的软件包（如果这些软件包可用）。软件包名称可能只是以软件包名称列出，也可能包括扩展名以指定所需架构。每行应只包含一个软件包名称。
在下面输入软件包名称

trans-unit.source: Any system registered using this activation key will be subscribed to the selected child channels.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个激活码注册的所有系统都会订阅到所选子频道。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Selected child channels of the "SUSE Manager default" Base channel will be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：将订阅 "SUSE Manager default" 基础频道的选定子频道。

trans-unit.source: The following child channels of {0} can be associated with this activation key.
trans-unit.target: 可将 {0} 的以下子频道与这个激活码关联。

trans-unit.source: No configuration channels. To subscribe this activation key to a configuration channel, please visit the Subscribe to Channels tab.
trans-unit.target: 没有配置频道。要在配置频道中订阅此激活码，请访问 订阅频道 标签页。

trans-unit.source: No configuration channels are available for subscription. You have already subscribed this activation key to all available channels (view subscribed channels).
trans-unit.target: 订阅没有可用配置频道。您已经订阅了所有可用的频道（查看订阅的频道）。

trans-unit.source: Below are all the centrally-managed configuration channels to which this activation key is subscribed. They are in priority order with the highest-ranked channels appearing first in the list.
trans-unit.target: 下面是这个激活码订阅的所有集中管理的配置频道。它们按优先级排列，在列表里优先级最高的最先出现。

trans-unit.source: Below is a list of configuration channels available to this activation key. To subscribe to a channel, check its checkbox. Make sure you click the "{0}" button when you are finished with your changes.
trans-unit.target: 下面是这个激活码系统可用的配置频道列表。要订阅一个频道，请选定相应的复选框。请确保在完成修改后点击"{0}" 按钮。

trans-unit.source: This activation key is subscribed to the configuration channels listed below in order from highest to lowest rank. Files from a particular channel will override files with the same filepath and name from channels below it.
trans-unit.target: 这个激活码用于在下面从高到低排名进行排列的配置频道的订阅。特定频道中的文件将覆盖其下面频道里的有着相同文件路径和名称的文件。

trans-unit.source: To modify the respective rankings of the subscribed channels, you may select one channel at a time to move up or down using the arrow buttons below. After you have completed the ranking process, you will need to click on "{0}" below to confirm the channel subscriptions and ordering.
trans-unit.target: 要修改订阅的频道各自的排名，您可以选择一个频道并用箭头键上下移动它。在您完成了排名过程后，您将需要点击下面的 "{0}" 来确认频道订阅和顺序。

trans-unit.source: No System Groups. To add System Groups this activation key, please visit the {1} tab.
trans-unit.target: 没有系统组群。要在这个激活码中添加系统组群，请访问 {1} 标签页。

trans-unit.source: No system groups are available to add. You have already added all the system groups available (View System Groups) to this activation key.
trans-unit.target: 没有可添加的系统组群。您已经在这个激活码中添加了所有可用系统组群（查看系统组群）。

trans-unit.source: Below are all the system groups that have been added to this activation key. Any system registering with this activation key will be added to the selected system groups. To remove a system group membership, check its checkbox and make sure you click the "{0}" button when you are finished with your changes.
trans-unit.target: 以下是已经添加到这个激活码中的所有系统组群。会将所有使用这个激活码注册的系统添加选择的系统组群。要删除系统组群成员，请选定其复选框并确定完成更改后点击 "{0}" 按钮。

trans-unit.source: Below is a list of system groups available to this activation key. To join a system group, check its checkbox. Make sure you click the "{0}" button when you are finished with your changes.
trans-unit.target: 下面是对于这个激活码来说可用的系统组群列表。要添加系统组群，请选定其复选框，并确定完成更改后点击 "{0}" 按钮。

trans-unit.source: Below are all the systems that have been registered with this activation key.
trans-unit.target: 以下是所有使用这个激活码注册的系统。

trans-unit.source: The following stored profiles exist within your organization. To create a stored profile from a system, go to the Packages view for that system.
trans-unit.target: 您的机构中有以下保存的侧写。要从某个系统创建保存的侧写，请进入软件包查看那个系统。

trans-unit.source: The following packages are associated with this stored profile.
trans-unit.target: 以下软件包与此储存的配置文件相关联。

trans-unit.source: Are you certain you want to delete this key? All systems' values for this key will be deleted as well.
trans-unit.target: 您确定要删除这个密钥吗？这个密钥的所有系统值都将会被删除。

trans-unit.source: Rank the new configuration channel subscriptions. Configuration files in channels appearing higher in the list will override configuration files with the same path in lower channels. Choose a channel in the list and then use the up and down arrows to change its priority. Also select what priority the configuration channels listed here will have in relation to current configuration channel subscriptions for each system.
trans-unit.target: 对新的配置频道订阅进行排名。列表里位置较高的配置文件将用较低频道里的相同路径覆盖配置文件。选择列表里的频道然后使用上下箭头来改变优先级。选择这里列出的配置频道的优先级将和每个系统里当前配置频道订阅相关。
步骤 2：对订阅的频道进行排名。

trans-unit.source: Locally-managed configuration files are useful for overriding centrally-managed configuration profiles that cause problems on particular systems. trans-unit.source: Autoinstallable distributions may be invalid due to a wrong or non existent base path to the kernel or initrd image. To make your custom distribution valid please select the distribution and modify its base path appropriately.
trans-unit.target: Kickstart 发布版本可能是无效的，这是由于错误的或不存在的内核或 Initrd 映像基础路径。要使您的自定义版本有效，请选择相应的版本并修改其基础路径。

trans-unit.source:
The following details are needed to define an autoinstallable distribution. The tree path field should be a valid path to an installation tree located on this @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ server.

The Distribution Label field should contain only letters, numbers, hyphens, periods, and underscores. It must also be at least 4 characters long.

The Tree Path, Base Channel, and Installer Generation should always match. This generally means that the versions for each field should be from the same version of @@ENTERPRISE_LINUX_NAME@@.

The Tree Path must be a local disk path on your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ server containing the entire autoinstallable tree for a distribution including kernel, initrd, and repo information, but excluding any rpms. This directory should be readable by the apache and tomcat users. If you have media located on the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ server at: /var/distro-trees/sles-11-server/ you would specify that path as your Tree Path value.
trans-unit.target:
定义一个可 Kickstart 的发布版本，下面的细节需要被指定。『tree path』字段应该是一个位于该 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服务器上的合理路径。Kickstart RPM 应该是包含 kickstart 部署描述符的 RPM 的名字。这些 RPM 由 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 提供并位于 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 工具子频道里。

『Distribution Label』字段应该只包含字母、数字、连字符、句点和下划线。它至少要有 4 个字符长。

树路径、Kickstart RPM、基础频道和安装程序生成（Installer Generation）都因该匹配。这通常意味着每个字段的版本应该来自相同的红帽 企业级 Linux。

树路径（Tree Path）应该是 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服务器上的一个本地磁盘路径，它包含完整的 Kickstart 树、内核、initrd 和库信息，但不包括任何 RPM。Apache 和 Tomcat 用户应该可以读取这个目录。从指定的树路径里，内核应该位 "./images/pxeboot/vmlinuz"，而 initrd 映像应该位于 "./images/pxeboot/initrd.img"。例如，如果您有位于 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服务器上 /var/distro-trees/rhel-5-server/ 的媒体文件，你可以指定该路径为树路径，内核和 initrd 应该位于：/var/distro-trees/rhel-5-server/images/pxeboot/

trans-unit.source:
As a Channel Administrator, you may change the base channels your systems are subscribed to. Valid channels are either channels created by your organization, or the default @@VENDOR_NAME@@ base channel for your operating system version and processor type. Systems will be unsubscribed from all channels, and subscribed to their new base channels.

This operation can have a dramatic effect on the packages and patches available to the systems, and should be used with caution.
trans-unit.target:
作为频道管理员，您可以修改系统订阅的基础频道。有效频道是您组织创建的频道，或者适用于您操作系统版本和处理器类型的默认 @@VENDOR_NAME@@ 基础频道。系统将取消订阅所有频道，并订阅其新的基础频道。

此操作可能对系统可用的软件包和补丁产生重大影响，因此请慎用。

trans-unit.source: This is your organizations default autoinstallation profile.

trans-unit.source: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ allows administrators to efficiently manage the systems on their network. Through a simple user interface, administrators can perform patch management, updates and maintenance. And because @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ is Web-based, it can be accessed from anywhere. @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ or Proxy server options provide advanced capabilities and the ability to get updates directly from SUSE with even greater levels of security and reduced network bandwidth.
trans-unit.target: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 可让管理员有效管理其网络中的系统。管理员可以通过一个简单的用户界面执行补丁管理、更新和维护。@@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 基于 Web，因此可以从任何位置访问它。@@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 或代理服务器选项提供高级功能以及直接从 SUSE 获取更新的功能，并可以进一步提高安全级别和减少网络带宽占用。

trans-unit.source: All @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ functionality (system profiles, reporting data, application server, etc.) is stored locally on the customer's network. This provides customers with the ability to take their @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ solution off of the public internet if desired, and also allows for greater optimization and control of their systems. By using a @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Proxy server in conjunction with the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ server, the customer's individual systems connect to a locally hosted Proxy. The Proxy aggregates data and performs some tasks locally, communicating with the central @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ servers. All information stored in the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ database is kept on the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ servers.
trans-unit.target: 所有 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 功能（系统配置文件、报告数据、应用程序服务器等） 都储存在客户网络本地。这样，客户便可根据需要使其 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 解决方案脱离公共因特网，同时对其 系统进行更好的优化和控制。 将 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 代理服务器与 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服务器结合使用， 可将客户的单个系统连接到本地托管的代理。 代理将与 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 中央服务器通讯，在本地聚合数据并执行一些任务。 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 数据库中储存的所有信息都保留在 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服务器上。

trans-unit.source: Detailed information regarding @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ server and its installation.
trans-unit.target: 有关 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服务器及其安装的详细信息。
有关 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Proxy 服务器的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Select the channel you wish to clone from the list below. You can clone a channel in one of three ways:

trans-unit.source: Current state of the channel (all patches)
trans-unit.target: 频道的当前状态（所有补丁）

trans-unit.source: The new channel will include all of the latest packages from the target channel, and all patches related to the channel will be cloned into your organization. If your organization already owns a clone of a patch, the new channel will be associated with that patch instead of creating another clone of the patch.
trans-unit.target: 新频道将包含目标频道中的所有最新软件包，与新频道相关的所有补丁将克隆到您的组织中。如果您的组织已拥有某个补丁的克隆版本，则新频道将与该补丁相关联，而不会创建补丁的另一个克隆版本。

trans-unit.source: Original state of the channel (no patches)
trans-unit.target: 频道的原始状态（无补丁）

trans-unit.source: The new channel will be a clone of the original state of the target channel. This is done by cloning all of the packages from the target channel which do not have a patch associated with them. No patch will be cloned into your organization.
trans-unit.target: 新频道将是目标频道原始状态的克隆版本。这是通过克隆目标频道中没有关联补丁的所有软件包实现的。不会将任何补丁克隆到您的组织中。

trans-unit.source: The original state of the target channel will be cloned into the new channel. You will then have the option to select the patches you wish to import into the new channel. Importing a patch will bring the packages from the target channel referred to by the patch into the new channel. Selecting all of the patches from the list of potential patches is the same as cloning the current state of the channel. Selecting none of the patches is the same as cloning the original state of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 目标频道的原始状态将克隆到新频道中。然后，您可以使用相应的选项来选择要导入到新频道的补丁。导入某个补丁会将目标频道中由该补丁引用的软件包引入到新频道中。选择潜在补丁列表中的所有补丁等同于克隆频道的当前状态。不选择任何补丁等同于克隆频道的原始状态。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you wish to delete this channel? Packages in the channel will be removed from the channel, but will remain on the server. You will be given the option to delete them after the channel has been deleted. Patches related to the channel will no longer be related to the channel, and may be orphaned. If the channel has child channels, it cannot be deleted; the child channels must be deleted first. If the channel has autoinstallable distributions associated to it, it cannot be deleted; the distributions must be dissociated from the channel or deleted first.
trans-unit.target: 您确实想要删除此频道吗？此频道中的软件包将被删除，但仍会保留在服务器中。 系统会提供相应的选项让您在删除频道后删除其中的 软件包。与频道相关的补丁将不再与该频道相关，并且 可能会处于孤立状态。 如果频道包含子频道，则无法删除该频道；必须先 删除子频道。 如果频道具有关联的可自动安装的发行套件，则无法 删除该频道；必须先从该频道取消关联发行套件

trans-unit.source: Channel deletion will affect any Trusted Organizations that have systems subscribed to the {0} channel.
trans-unit.target: 删除频道会影响其系统已订阅 {0} 频道的 任何可信组织。

trans-unit.source: Unsubscribe all trusted organization systems that are subscribed to the {0} channel. Subscribed systems will lose access to packages specific to this channel.
trans-unit.target: 取消订阅已订阅 {0} 频道的所有可信组织 系统。已订阅系统将失去对此频道特定的软件包的访问权限。

trans-unit.source:
Create or edit software channels from this page.

If the parent channel is set to 'none', the channel is a base channel. Otherwise, the channel is a child of the specified channel.

Channel name and label are required.
They each must be at least 6 characters in length.
Channel name must not be longer than 256 characters and channel label must not be longer than 128 characters.
Channel name and label may begin with a letter or digit.
They each must not begin with rhn, redhat or red hat.
They each must contain only lowercase letters, hyphens ('-'), periods ('.'), underscores ('_'), and numerals.
Channel name may also contain spaces, parentheses () and forward slashes ('/').

Channel summary is also required and must not exceed 500 characters.
trans-unit.target:
在此页面创建或者编辑软件频道。

如果将上级频道设置为 'none'，则这个频道为基础频道。 否则，该频道为指定频道的子频道。

必须有频道名称和标签。
每个频道名称或者标签必须至少有 6 个字符。
频道名称不得超过 256 个字符，同时频道标签不得超过 128 个字符。
频道名称必须以字母开始，频道标签可以以字母或者数字开始。
它们都不得以 rhn、redhat 或者 red hat 开始。
它们都必须只能使用小写字母、小横线 ('-')、点 ('.')、下划线 ('_') 及数字。
频道名称还可包含空格、小括号() 和正斜杠 ('/')。

还要求提供不超过 500 个字符的频道概述。

Requests should be sent by e-mail to sle_source_request@suse.com or as otherwise instructed at https://www.suse.com/download-linux/source-code.html.
